translations: [测] 三角测量；三角形划分

sentences.sentence: Surface triangulations based-on 3D arbitrary point-sets are widely applied in CAGD/CAD and reverse-engineering, etc.
sentences.translation: 根据三维散乱点集构造曲面剖分在CAGD/CAD、反求工程等方面有着十分广泛的应用。

sentences.sentence: Triangulations from 3d scattered point sets play an important role in surface modeling. The applied criterion determines the final triangulation.
sentences.translation: 由3 D散乱点集构造三角剖分在曲面造型中有着十分重要的作用，而剖分所采用的优化准则决定了最终的剖分结构。

sentences.sentence: To ensure the existence of boundary sides and faces, local tetrahedralization method is adopted, needing add no node into the origin surface triangulations.
sentences.translation: 采用局部剖分的方法来保证边界的完整性，不需要添加新的节点到原始表面三角形中。
